column4: Tesla CFO Deepak Ahuja to retire  help find replacement
column5: DETROIT  June 9 Tesla Motors Chief Financial Officer Deepak Ahuja will retire later this year  but will stay on to help search for a successor  Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk told shareholders on Tuesday.

column4: Intel pledges $125 million for start-ups that back women  minorities
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Following up on its earlier pledge to spend $300 million over the next five years to improve diversity  Intel Corp promised more on Tuesday  this time to back companies with women and minorities in leadership roles.
